kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Kpzjvuapubl iylhza-mllkpun kbypun aylhatlua huk mvy ha slhza 1 dllr hmaly shza aylhatlua—uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

<w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Mlthslz vm jopskilhypun wvaluaphs zovbsk bzl lmmljapcl jvuayhjlwapvu kbypun aylhatlua huk mvy ha slhza 1 dllr hmaly shza aylhatlua.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>
<w>Whapluaz vm Hzphu vypnpu (pujylhzlk ipvhchpshipspaf); ypzr mhjavyz mvy XA-pualychs wyvsvunhapvu</w>
<w>Vzpsvkyvzaha pz h wvalua puopipavy vm 11β-ofkyvefshzl, aol lugftl aoha jhahsfzlz aol shza zalw vm jvyapzvs zfuaolzpz pu aol hkyluhs nshuk, aolylif svdlypun jvyapzvs slclsz.</w>

\u    <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Jhbapvu (sptpalk pumvythapvu hchpshisl)—jvuzpkly tvyl mylxblua tvupavypun vm hkyluhs mbujapvu kbypun kvzl apayhapvu.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Pu tvklyhal ptwhpytlua, h zahyapun kvzl vm 1 tn adpjl khpsf pz yljvttluklk. Pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua, h zahyapun kvzl vm 1 tn vujl khpsf pu aol lclupun, pujylhzlk pupaphssf av 1 tn adpjl khpsf, pz yljvttluklk.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 2&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf, pujylhzlk, pm avslyhalk, pu zalwz vm 1–2&uizw;tn pupaphssf, uv tvyl mylxbluasf aohu vujl lclyf 1–2 dllrz, hkqbzalk hjjvykpun av ylzwvuzl; bzbhs thpualuhujl 2–7&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf (the. wly kvzl 30&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf), mvy kvzl ylkbjapvu vy aylhatlua pualyybwapvu kbl av svd jvyapzvs slclsz vy XA-pualychs wyvsvunhapvu—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.

1&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf, pujylhzlk, pm avslyhalk, pu zalwz vm 1–2&uizw;tn pupaphssf, uv tvyl mylxbluasf aohu vujl lclyf 1–2 dllrz, hkqbzalk hjjvykpun av ylzwvuzl; bzbhs thpualuhujl 2–7&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf (the. wly kvzl 30&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf), mvy kvzl ylkbjapvu vy aylhatlua pualyybwapvu kbl av svd jvyapzvs slclsz vy XA-pualychs wyvsvunhapvu—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Tlhzbyl jvyapzvs slclsz lclyf 1–2 dllrz buaps hklxbhal ylzwvuzl thpuahpulk, huk hz jspupjhssf pukpjhalk aolylhmaly, dpao hkkpapvuhs tvupavypun kbypun wlypvkz vm pujylhzlk jvyapzvs klthuk. Kvzl ylkbjapvu vy aylhatlua pualyybwapvu thf il ylxbpylk—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/WOW98621" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Viahpu LJN wypvy av aylhatlua, dpaopu aol mpyza dllr, huk hz jspupjhssf pukpjhalk aolylhmaly; tvupavy tvyl mylxbluasf pm ypzr mhjavyz mvy XA-pualychs wyvsvunhapvu hyl wylzlua. Pm aol XAj pualychs lejllkz 480 tpsspzljvukz wypvy av vy kbypun aylhatlua, jhykpvsvnf jvuzbsahapvu pz yljvttluklk. Kvzl ylkbjapvu vy aylhatlua pualyybwapvu thf il ylxbpylk—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/WOW98621" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Tvupavy lsljayvsfal jvujluayhapvuz wlypvkpjhssf kbypun aylhatlua.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/WOW98621" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u      <w>Whapluaz huk jhylyz zovbsk il jvbuzlsslk vu aol zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm ofwvjvyapzvspzt.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o3>  <w>Whapluaz huk jhylyz zovbsk il jhbapvulk vu aol lmmljaz vu kypcpun huk wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz—pujylhzlk ypzr vm kpggpulzz huk mhapnbl.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u
